item.haema.vampire_blood.desc: Introdúcelo en un Inyector de Sangre Vampírica...
item.haema.vampire_blood_injector.desc: ¿Posees la Fuerza necesaria para convertirte en Vampiro?
Si eres Débil, puedes volver a la normalidad
death.attack.bloodLoss.player: %1$s perdió demasiada sangre mientras luchaba contra %2$s
death.attack.incompatibleBlood.player: %1$s olvidó beber Fuerza mientras luchaba contra %2$s
death.attack.sunlight.player: %1$s ardió al sol mientras luchaba contra %2$s
origin.haema.vampire.name: Vampiro
origin.haema.vampire.description: Aunque dañados por la luz solar, los vampiros poseen mucha fuerza en la oscuridad, siempre y cuando estén provistos de sangre.
power.haema.vampire.name: Sanguinario
power.haema.vampire.description: Dejas de necesitar comida, sino que debes beber sangre como sustento. Bebe de mobs usando shift+click derecho - cuanto más humanoide más sangre obtendrás.
power.haema.ritualistic.name: Ritualista
power.haema.ritualistic.description: Puedes mejorar y obtener nuevas habilidades realizando rituales
power.haema.night_vision.name: Visión Nocturna
power.haema.night_vision.description: Tu visión, aunque sosa e insaturada, es capaz de distingir detalles en la oscuridad
power.haema.vampiric_strength.name: Fuerza Vampírica
power.haema.vampiric_strength.descriptio: La falta de sangre te debilita - pero cuanto más crece tu nivel de sangre, más fuerte, rápido y resistente al daño eres
power.haema.dash.name: Brío Vampírico
power.haema.dash.description: Si tu nivel de sangre es lo suficientemente alto, puedes usar una habilidad de corto rango para desplazarte rápidamente
gamerule.vampiresBurn.description: Determina si los vampiros arden a la luz del sol
gamerule.vampiresDrown.description: Determina si los vampiros pueden ahogarse
gamerule.feedCooldown.description: El tiempo en ticks que debe esperar un vampiro para alimentarse
gamerule.dashCooldown.description: El tiempo en ticks que debe esperar un vampiro para lanzarse
gamerule.vampireInvisibilityLength.descr: El tiempo en ticks que dura la Invisibilidad de un vampiro
gamerule.vampireHunterNoticeChance.descr: Probabilidad de que un grupo de cazadores de vampiros aparezca tras chupar la sangre de una criatura
gamerule.playerVampireConversion.descrip: Determina si los jugadores pueden convertirse en vampiros y viceversa
gamerule.sunlightDamagesArmour: Luz solar daña armadura de vampiros
gamerule.sunlightDamagesArmour.descripti: Determina si la armadura que lleva un vampiro ve reducida su durabilidad por la luz solar
bookOfBlood.name: Book Of Blood
bookOfBlood.beginning.blood.title: Finding Vampire Blood
$(item)Vampire Blood/$ can be found in dungeons, temples, or from trading with cleric villagers. It can be used to convert humans, those who are not vampires by origin, into vampires.
bookOfBlood.beginning.injector.title: Crafting an Injector
bookOfBlood.beginning.injector.text.1.te: Once you have $(item)Vampire Blood/$, you need to put it into an $(item)injector/$ - this is the tool that you will use to become a vampire!
bookOfBlood.beginning.becoming.title: Becoming a vampire!
bookOfBlood.beginning.becoming.text.1.te: Becoming a vampire is a dangerous process, so you need $(thing)Strength II/$ to survive it. When you have the $(thing)Strength II/$ effect, use the $(item)Vampire Blood Injector/$ on yourself and become a vampire!
bookOfBlood.surviving.description: How to stay alive as a vampire
bookOfBlood.surviving.nourishment.title: Nourishment
bookOfBlood.surviving.nourishment.text.1: You'll probably notice that your vision is much less saturated when you become a vampire - this is because you don't have enough $(thing)blood/$.
bookOfBlood.surviving.nourishment.text.2: As a vampire, you don't need food any more - your hunger bar is now a blood bar.
bookOfBlood.surviving.nourishment.text.3: You can gain blood by feeding from mobs with $(k:sneak)+$(k:use) - more 'human-like' mobs give better blood. You can feed as often as you like, but be careful - if you feed enough to kill something, $(thing)Vampire Hunters/$ have a chance of noticing you. Be careful feeding from villagers - if they're awake and notice you, they won't be very happy!
bookOfBlood.surviving.storage.title: Blood Storage
You can use $(item)Vampire Blood Injectors/$ and $(item)Empty Vampire Blood Injectors/$ to store blood for another time.
bookOfBlood.surviving.hunters.title: A Warning
bookOfBlood.surviving.hunters.text.1.tex: $(thing)Vampire Hunters/$ were once Illagers, who have turned from attacking villages to defending them from the threat of vampires.
bookOfBlood.surviving.hunters.text.2.tex: They have a chance of noticing when a mob dies from a vampire's feeding; also, villagers will call them to their aid if they notice a vampire feeding on them!
bookOfBlood.surviving.hunters.text.3.tex: They have crossbows, and will use them against you from a distance. They also have wooden swords for up-close fighting, so be careful!
bookOfBlood.surviving.weaknesses.title: Your Weaknesses
Vampires can only be killed by certain things. These are:$(br) - Sunlight$(br) - Lightning$(br) - Drowning$(br) - Dragon Breath$(br) - The Void$(br) - Certain weapons, such as wooden swords$(br) - Attacks with the Smite enchantment
bookOfBlood.surviving.sunlight.title: Sunlight
bookOfBlood.surviving.sunlight.text.1.te: Sunlight is deadly for vampires! In the harsh light of the sun, you'll start to burn.
bookOfBlood.surviving.sunlight.spotlight: Wearing full leather armour will let you stay in the sun for a short time.
bookOfBlood.powers.dash.title: Dash
bookOfBlood.powers.dash.text.1.text: Your $(thing)dash/$ ability is a short-range teleport, usable with $(k:haema.dash).$(br)You can only use your dash when you have 9 or more blood drops.$(br)Upgrading your dash reduces its cooldown.
bookOfBlood.powers.immortality.title: Vampire Immortality
bookOfBlood.powers.immortality.text.1.te: Vampires with this ability can only die to a few things - the sun, weapons with smite, the void, and a few more...
bookOfBlood.powers.invisibility.title: Invisibilty
bookOfBlood.powers.invisibility.text.1.t: With this ability, you can become invisible for short periods of time. Once you've obtained the ability by ritual, trigger it with $(k:sneak).$(br)You can only use invisibility when you have 8 or more blood drops.$(br)Upgrading your invisibility increases how long it lasts for.
bookOfBlood.powers.strength.title: Vampiric Strength
bookOfBlood.powers.strength.text.1.text: Vampires are much stronger and faster in their attacks than mortals - and the more blood they have, the stronger and faster they get!$(br)Upgrading this ability increases the maximum level of Vampiric Strength that you can get.
bookOfBlood.powers.vision.title: Vampire Vision
bookOfBlood.powers.vision.text.1.text: Being creatures of the night, vampires have much better night vision than humans - however, the day might be too bright for them...
bookOfBlood.rituals.description: Learn about arcane rituals that grant you new powers
bookOfBlood.rituals.stone_altar.title: Basic Altar
bookOfBlood.rituals.stone_altar.text.1.t: The $(thing)Basic Altar/$ can do some rituals, and can be made with regular stone bricks.
bookOfBlood.rituals.blackstone_altar.tex: The $(thing)Blackstone Altar/$ is capable of doing more rituals, powered by the souls trapped within its torches...
bookOfBlood.rituals.performing.title: Performing Rituals
bookOfBlood.rituals.performing.text.1.te: Rituals can give you more ability points, which you can use to gain or upgrade abilities.
bookOfBlood.rituals.performing.text.2.te: Rituals are performed by filling the altar's ditch with fluid and dropping in items, then standing on the table block and interacting ($(k:use)) with it.
bookOfBlood.rituals.performing.image.1.t: Right click on the ritual table with the Book of Blood in your hand to view all rituals in the REI/EMI recipe viewer.
gui.haema.title: HAEMA
gui.haema.config.gameplay.main: Haema se configura usando datapacks y gamerules.
gui.haema.config.gameplay.gameruleslink: Para aprender a usar gamerules, clica aquí.
gui.haema.config.gameplay.datapackslink: Para aprender a usar datapacks, clica aquí.
gui.haema.config.gameplay.bloodsources: Para fuentes de Sangre, Haema usa las siguientes entity tags:
gui.haema.config.gameplay.vampireweapons: Para armas efectivas contra vampiros, Haema usa la siguiente item tag:
gui.haema.config.gameplay.gamerules: Las gamerules que Haema añade se pueden ver en la pantalla de Crear Nuevo Mundo.
gui.haema.message.conversion_blocked_by_: La Game Rule 'playerVampireConversion' (Conversión a Vampiro) no está activada.
gui.haema.message.conversion_not_possibl: El jugador es un vampiro permanente y no puede convertirse.
gui.haema.message.no_recipe_viewer: Instala Roughly Enough Items o EMI para ver posibles rituales.
text.autoconfig.haema.title: Haema
text.autoconfig.haema.option.brightAdjus: 0 = sin aumento de la brillantez. 1 = aumento de brillantez predeterminado.
text.autoconfig.haema.option.distortionA: 0 =sin distorsión. 1 = distorsión predeterminada. Esto se multiplica con el ajuste de vanilla 'Distorsión de Efectos'.
text.autoconfig.haema.option.saturationA: 0 = sin cambios en la saturación. 1 = cambios en la saturación predeterminados.
ability.haema.strength.description: Fuerza Vampírica te da un pequeño aumento de ataque y velocidad
ability.haema.dash.description: Tu habilidad de brío es una teletransportación de corto alcance
ability.haema.invisibility.description: Una invisibilidad de corto plazo mientras te agachas
ability.haema.immortality.description: ¡El poder de la inmortalidad! Sobrevive a prácticamente cualquier cosa.
ability.haema.vision.description: La visión de un vampiro es mejor en la oscuridad que en la luz del sol.
ability.haema.mist_form.description: Conviértete en una nube de niebla, envenenando y cegando a tus enemigos.
advancement.haema.drink_blood.descriptio: Chupa la sangre de una criatura.
advancement.haema.drink_good_blood.descr: Consigue sangre de calidad de un aldeano
advancement.haema.drink_player_blood: Tu corazón está colgando en mis manos
advancement.haema.fulfil_contract.descri: Completa un Contrato de Cazador de Vampiros
advancement.haema.get_blood.description: Encuentra sangre de un vampiro anciano
advancement.haema.get_contract.descripti: Consigue un Contrato de un Líder Cazavampiros
advancement.haema.root.description: Consigue el libro de conocimiento antiguo...
advancement.haema.store_blood.descriptio: Extrae un poco de sangre para luego
advancement.haema.use_blood.description: Inyecta la sangre en tu cuerpo... no olvides tener Fuerza II.
advancement.haema.use_invis: Ahora me ves, ahora no me ves
